meta.name: Pharinix
meta.description: Light weight framework with many interesting features. Data model with unix like security, configurable with it self, URL rewrite and mapping, etc... it's the perfect backend to your application.

parameters.show: Response by default, it must show areas or not.

hooks.name: driverCommandGetAlertHook
hooks.description: Allow rewrite a HTML alert message.

parameters.alert: Response to be echoed to the client.

hooks.name: urlRewriteHook
hooks.description: Before work over a rewrited URL.

parameters.canceled: TRUE to stop normal conversion, we need do a replacement.

hooks.name: urlRewriteNotFoundHook
hooks.description: Response if the rewrited not found.

parameters.body: The body to write, default is empty, ''.
parameters.status: The status header to return, default is 'HTTP/1.0 404 Not Found'.

hooks.name: coreDefaultInterfaceHook
hooks.description: If not interface defined by parameters core select echoHtml by default, this Hook allow change that default.

parameters.command: Default command to use how interface, default 'echoHtml'.

hooks.name: coreCatchParametersHook
hooks.description: By default Pharinix will expect parameters in POST format, whit this hook we can translate JSON, XML or any other format to POST. It don't have parameters why use superglobal variables.

hooks.name: coreShowDefaultPageHook
hooks.description: Allow change default command to show the default page.

hooks.name: coreDefaultCommandHook
hooks.description: Default command to execute when interface is not HTML.
